entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
